channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oil prices rise over 2% after OPEC+ delays production increase by another month
item.description: Oil futures saw strong gains Monday after the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries said members would wait yet another month before beginning to unwind production cuts.

item.title: Barry Diller calls timing of The Washington Post's non-endorsement a 'blunder'
item.description: Expedia chairman Barry Diller called the timing of The Washington Post's decision not to endorse a presidential candidate a "blunder."

item.title: Stocks waver ahead of presidential election, Nvidia rises on Dow inclusion: Live updates
item.description: Stocks struggled to find a direction on Monday as investors geared up for the highly-anticipated U.S. presidential election.

item.title: Trading as a side hustle?
item.description: Good evening, For most of us, trading is a side hustle. Quite often, members ask me if they should go full-time. Hereâ€™s my opinion. Traders who can transition from a side hustle to full-time trading are very skilled. Their skills are so dialed in that, at any time, they can take a small amount of [â€¦]

item.title: Viking Therapeuticsâ€™ weight-loss pill shows â€˜great outcomeâ€™ in trial
item.description: The stock, which enjoys the unusual position of having all buy ratings from the 13 analysts offering coverage on FactSet, has been on a tear this year, gaining 270% to date in 2024.

item.title: Singapore Airlines will add first class, revamp cabins for longest flights
item.description: Singapore Airlines will add a first class to its ultra-long-range aircraft and increase the number of business class seats in race for high-spending travelers.

item.title: Foreign buyers eye Japan's empty houses with millions available for cheap â€” but experts warn of risks
item.description: While many places in the world face a housing shortage, Japan is facing the opposite problem: An oversupply of homes on the market.

item.title: U.S. factory orders tumble in September, for fourth drop in the past five months
item.description: Orders for manufactured goods fell 0.5% in September, the Commerce Department said Monday. It is the fourth decline in orders in the past five months.

item.title: Ford October vehicle sales increase 15.2% from subdued levels due to labor strike in 2023
item.description: Ford on Monday reported a 15.2% increase in U.S. new vehicles sales last month compared to subdued levels during a union strike in October 2023.

item.title: Singapore Airlines will add first class, revamp cabins for longest flights
item.description: Singapore Airlines will add a first class to its ultra-long-range aircraft and increase the number of business class seats in race for high-spending travelers.

item.title: Why Constellation Energyâ€™s stock is seeing a record selloff despite profit beat
item.description: Shares of Constellation Energy Corp. were in danger of a record selloff on Monday and were headed for their lowest prices since before the nuclear-power company signed a 20-year power-purchasing agreement with Microsoft Corp. in September.

item.title: Striking Boeing machinists vote on union-backed contract proposal, this time with a warning
item.description: The vote is the third time since September that Boeing's machinists are considering a new labor deal.

item.title: Election 2024 live updates: Harris and Trump make last appeals to battleground voters
item.description: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump will hold dueling rallies in Pittsburgh and Reading on the campaign's final day, underscoring Pennsylvania's must-win status.

item.title: Big News is Powering This Small Cap Higher

item.title: 10-, 30-year yields dive from 4-month highs after Iowa poll tilts in favor of Harris
item.description: Treasury yields broadly fell on Monday, reversing most of the previous sessionâ€™s action, after a key poll gave Vice President Kamala Harris an edge over former President Donald Trump ahead of Tuesdayâ€™s election.

item.title: Trump's closing campaign message is hampered by distractions, disconnect
item.description: Donald Trump's campaign has faced backlash for several controversial remarks in the final days of his campaign against Vice President Kamala Harris.

item.title: Quincy Jones, musical maestro and entertainment industry titan, dies at 91
item.description: In a prolific career that spanned more than 70 years, Jones established himself as a behind-the-scenes force and a gifted artist in his own right.
